quote: Such a funny thing, time. You spend your whole life wishing there was more or less of it, never realizing that the time already given could be worth more than that which you wished for.‚Äù -Davina
quote_letters: SUCH A FUNNY THING TIME YOU SPEND YOUR WHOLE LIFE WISHING THERE WAS MORE OR LESS OF IT NEVER REALIZING THAT THE TIME ALREADY GIVEN COULD BE WORTH MORE THAN THAT WHICH YOU WISHED FOR -DAVINA
